body: Metroid is yet another faggot that comes into comment sections to instigate arguements. This community is such a garbage place, with both sides of the stupid civil war on here attacking each other. This site shouldn't have a goddamn comment section.

This should make you think "wow, whoever buy those have to be really repressed, not even a wizard, but either an Ancient Sage or a teenager just entering puberty" since the vanilla is mostly free."

@ Moral Degeneration you said "@Noobgod Why? Because NTR is what's trending and vanilla doesn't sell as much as Netorare does. Want to be a popular artist? Draw a petty plot with a lot of holes and make it Netorare/Loli/Netori.". Let me correct you: NTR don't need plot. NTR is just a good draw where some character said "I'll rape you because I've this useless blacmail that can't even be used otherwise I'd be linched and you'll be NTRed" and that happen. No plot whatever. Just, you know, a good drawed work for some loser that can't even get an hard on without thinking about rape. Or some sh*t like that.

Lol, I hate it when the author doesn't give a clear ending. Fuck you author. The last chapter gave me a vague shit ending. And for the people who don't know yet, chapter 1 is actually the "last" 8th chapter. Or  the real 7th. IDK
hoo i think she's going to end up with the teacher on last chap.. YnD going for NTR with perfect angst feeling in it.. lovely chapter first.. broken past.. bad ending.. perfect.. lol..
